mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS displayNumber, article_id AS articleId, title, content, like_cnt AS likeCnt, view_cnt AS viewCnt, created_at AS createdAt FROM ARTICLE WHERE category_code = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{page}

SELECT article_id AS articleId, writer, title, content, category_code AS categoryCode, like_cnt AS likeCnt, view_cnt AS viewCnt, score, status, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM ARTICLE WHERE article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT article_id AS articleId, title, like_cnt AS likeCnt, view_cnt AS viewCnt, created_at AS createdAt, score AS score FROM ARTICLE WHERE created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND NOW() AND like_cnt >= 10 ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT article_id AS articleId, title, like_cnt AS likeCnt, view_cnt AS viewCnt, created_at AS createdAt FROM ARTICLE WHERE category_code = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
